description: In Dune, Paul Atreides joins forces with Chani and the Fremen to avenge his family's downfall. Faced with a pivotal decision, he balances love and duty to avert a catastrophic destiny.

Oppenheimer follows the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who led the Manhattan Project, as he grapples with the moral and ethical implications of creating the atomic bomb, ultimately shaping the course of modern history.
